author: Joseph Young
title: Persian Gulf’s Migrant Lockdown Risks a ‘Wildfire’ Coronavirus Outbreak
description: Qatar reportedly has tens of thousands of migrant workers in a crowded area. Many coronavirus cases were reported in an industrial zone. The post Persian Gulf’s Migrant Lockdown Risks a ‘Wildfire’ Coronavirus Outbreak appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Tens of thousands of locked down migrant workers in overcrowded conditions risks a serious of coronavirus outbreak.
